Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.entities.Entity
game.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player character in the game. Handles physics (gravity, jumping), health system, and animations.

Features:

  • Double jump capability (up to 2 jumps in air)
  • Sliding ability (reduces hitbox height)
  • Health system (0-100 HP)
  • Multiple animations (idle, jump, double jump, slide)
  • Platform collision detection

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(double x, double y)
      Constructs a new Player at the specified position. Default size is 80x80 pixels.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial x-coordinate
      y - the initial y-coordinate

  • Method Details

    • loadAnimations

      private void loadAnimations()
      Loads all player animation sprites from the sprite sheet. Creates animations for idle, jump, double jump, and slide states.

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • jump

      public boolean jump()
      Makes the player jump. Supports double jump.
      Returns:
      true if jump was successful, false if maximum jumps reached

    • slide

      public void slide(boolean start)
      Starts or stops the player's slide.
      Parameters:
      start - true to start sliding, false to stop

    • isSliding

      public boolean isSliding()
      Checks if the player is currently sliding.
      Returns:
      true if sliding, false otherwise

    • collectCoin

      public int collectCoin()
      Called when player collects a coin.
      Returns:
      the score value of the coin (100 points)

    • activateSpeedBoost

      public int activateSpeedBoost()
      Called when player activates a speed boost.
      Returns:
      the bonus score for collecting speed boost (50 points)

    • heal

      public void heal(double amount)
      Restores health to the player, capped at maximum health.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount of health to restore

    • damage

      public void damage(double amount)
      Reduces player health by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount of damage to take

    • getHealth

      public double getHealth()
      Gets the player's current health.
